News.headline: Twitter Competition: Signed Football Manager 2017
News.short_description: We are giving away a Football Manager 2017 game which has been signed by Daggers manager John Still on our twitter page.
News.description:
Head over to our twitter to be up for a chance of winning a copy of Football Manager 2017 signed by Daggers manager John Still.

Winner will be picked on Saturday at 1:00pm, so head over to our twitter page now to enter, all you have to do is re-tweet our Football Manager competition tweet.

Our twitter competition tweet is linked below, don't miss out on the chance to get the game signed by John Still.

Click here to head over to the tweet.Â
